DOC.brief_summary: The patellofemoral pain syndrome ( PFPS ) define painful complaint anterior aspect knee , although peripatellar pain / retropatellar also common . In general , conservative treatment initial option choice patient PFPS , however , lack specific causal factor make difficult choose best treatment early . This way , purpose study investigate effect quadriceps femoris strengthen versus hamstring stretch patient pattellofemoral pain .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Two Protocols Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Symptoms anterior knee pain least 1 moth ; Average pain level 3 10cm visual analogue scale step 25cm height ; Anterior retropatellar knee pain least 2 follow activity : prolong sitting , climb stair , squat , run , kneel , hopping/jumping ; Presence 2 follow clinical criterion assessment : pain apprehension test , pain patellar compression test , crepitation compression test . Previous knee surgery arthritis ; History patellar dislocation subluxation , malalignment , ligament laxity ; Patellar tendon pathology chondral damage ; Spinal refer pain ; History abnormality leg length inequality ( > 2 cm ) ; Medication part treatment ; Previous physical therapy acupuncture treatment knee within previous 30 day .
